reviews.review: The singleplayer is great. The coop is phenomenal. One of my top games of all time.

Previous to this game I did not consider it possible for, what is basically a puzzle solving game to have a great story with characters that you will remember for a long time.
The game builds perfectly on portal 1. Expanding on it just enough while introducing new characters and story elements that will keep you for "1 more level". 
Certainly not the longest game ever and I completed it in a couple of plays. I was so intent on seeing how the story progressed that I did rush it somewhat.
Stephen Merchant played wheatley to perfection. He will have you laughing on more than one occasion throughout the game.

I have recently discovered the co-op content too which is also very enjoyable and has some pretty funny quips from GLaDOS.

100% buy this game on sale. Even at full price if you like the series.
Genellikle Co-op şekilde oynadım multiplayerını çok tavsiye ederim singleplayernı yorumlayabilecek kadar oynamadım

I recommend this game. It has a unique plot and overall is fun to play. I recommend the first one as well.

Been playing the Portal series ever since my friend introduced it to me. The Portal games mean a lot to me and I've played them through co op or single player with many friends and hope I continue to introduce the game to other friends I make just like my friend did for me.
Along with its predecessor, one of the greatest games ever made and an absolute must-play for everyone.
Excelente juego para que pases tu cuarentena en casa
fun one to two player puzzle game

I wish Valve would continue making games like they used to. The portal series is a good game for people new to video games and veterans. This first person puzzle game will have you invested in the story and characters for quite a long time. After you've gone through the campaign, which I recommend playing the first portal and then this in order to get some of the references, the multiplayer will grant you many fond and hilarious memories with your friends. This is another game to pick up right away when getting your steam library for the first time.

thin bot > thicc bot. 

this is a great game to play co-op. I'd say it's worth it for that alone. the puzzles are difficult, but it's never anything that was too hard to solve after working with your partner
ONE OF THE BEST GAMES I HAVE EVER PLAYED! ALSO WHERE IS PORTAL3!!!!!!!!!!!!!?
Jogo que deixa vocês preso em fases o tempo todo, mas que vale a pena, jogar com um amigo e ficarem discutindo oque daria certo ou não, muito bom.

别出心裁的游戏体验，剧情的连贯性极强，在享受游戏玩法的同时，也在探索这个世界的冰山一角。而且作为一款2010年左右的游戏，画质完全可以接受，优化也非常好，有一种独特的质感。你玩了这个游戏就会发现：这个游戏真的仅此一家，比起portal1， portal2的画质好了很多，多了很多大空间的传送，最后的结局更是让人心旷神怡，会心一笑。Portal1和2都是非常有诚意的作品，非常推荐试一试。每次过关，你都会有一种说不出的成就感，尤其是每次飞起来又落下的那种感觉很好，还有这个游戏的脑洞是真不少，你会被惊艳到的。
Easily in the top 5 games I have ever played.

Na minha opinião (que não vale poha nenhuma), esse jogo é uma obra de arte.

- história 10/10
- personagens 10/10
- jogabilidade 10/10
- dublagem 11/10

Absolute banger of a game. I see why it is and will continue to be a classic. The graphics are pretty good, the world feels huge and the new puzzle mechanics are cool. The dialog is funny and enjoyable, as is the story. I have yet to play with dev commentary, but I look forward to it.
Jogo de puzzle muito bom, excelente para modo coop

Just had the opportunity (and hardware!) to play this gem. Genious!! Loved every single bit of it!! The tests, the jokes, the bond...this truly is a piece of art and will remain in history as one of the greatest ever to be made! My sincere thank you to all the team, staff, designers, thinkers, doers, organizers...well, actually everyone that was involved in this masterpiece!! Will be waiting for a third installment, assuming i have the required specifications!

it good just play it lol

Portal 2 – Jest to gra logiczno-zręcznościowa. W grze wcielamy się w bohaterkę, która zostaje poddana testom przez Glados!?. Ale zaraz… Przecież ona zginęła w pierwszej części. Otóż niekoniecznie. W tej części pragnie się na nas zemścić, jest bardziej zła, nieobliczalna i psychiczna. Jednak na początku gry przyjdzie nam poznać milutkiego robocika, który pomoże nam w walce z kupą żelastwa. Jako broń będziemy używać  
Plusy + :
-Grafika (Lekko podrasowana od ostatniej części. Jest o wiele więcej szczegółów. Jest też używana większa paleta kolorów, przez co ciężej zobaczyć dane przejścia.)
-Muzyka (Dobrze dobrana muzyka tak samo jak w I części)
-Historia (Ponownie nic szczególnego. Na pewno jest bardziej nieprzewidywalna. W dodatku pozwolili sobie na więcej humoru.)
-Mechanika (Została bardzo rozbudowana od poprzedniej części. Oprócz portali w późniejszych etapach gry będziemy mieć do dyspozycji: Korytarze przenoszące przedmioty, żele itp.)
-Poziomy (Bardziej rozbudowane oraz trudniejsze niż w poprzedniej grze.)
-Tryb Co-Op (Dodatkowy etap gry to współpraca z naszym kolegą. Ten etap jest o wiele bardziej skomplikowany i wymaga większego zastanowienia od nas ,a także daje więcej zabawy.)
Minusy - :
Po dokładnej analizie wykryto: BRAK MINUSÓW ;)
Podsumowując Portal 2 to świetna gra. Bardziej dopracowana niż jego poprzedniczka.
MEU DEUS QUE JOGO MARAVILHOSOOOO, JOGUEM, É MUITO BOM!
